title: Too "frightened" to play another ranked
body:
Just had two damn awful teams as my team. Worse than bronze, afk, feeders, troll champ picks. Basic skillz missing. In Gold4 of all places.
I just know that my next ranked will be just as friggen bad. My MMR must be so high Rito "dota2 must succeed" matchmaker must be thinking i'm faker when i'm just an average support who cannot stop a wukong going 0/8 in 10min.

So sick of this shiite. I just want matched players pitted against each other, where the damn game isn't decided by the friggen load screen!!!!!!!!

I HATE HATE HATE the MATCHMAKER!!! PISS OFF WITH YOUR DAMN MMR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ps: got any tips to sink my MMR without matchmaker auto doing it for me?

replies.body:
2 games tonight
1st game, enemy sup and bot start feeding mid game, not grouping, ruin the game for their team giving mine an easy win
Second game, kayle 0/3 in 5min tilts like mad and starts feeding as in ban level feeding.
Meanwhile top was completely outclassed, not his fault, just his bronze vs. a top gold. Lost lane hard
Oh and our jg forgot masteries. Sigh.

The game is great, matchmaker can go have sexual relations with itself.

> [{quoted}](name=Belrick,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zm6LAfHg,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-27T11:16:13.333+0000)
>
> In Gold4 of all places.

Gold in OCE is the new bronze. There's still too many boosted bonobos from last year's dynamic queue... it's just gonna take some time to settle, you can't do much about it. And supporting in low elo is not easy. If you wanna climb you have to carry.

You end up with all sorts of teams on the rift, some good and some not so good. Sometimes the matchmaking nails it and sometimes it doesn't. Over time you just get used to it. Take each game for itself, with a clear head and trying your best and all that. If it's possible don't even check the ranks, just forget about it, and you'll find that you're unburdened of all sorts of expectations going into a match or disappointment afterwards. 

Not too long ago I was one loss from demoting to D5 from D4 and I was matched in a game with 8 Challengers. The game put me on ADC and suffice it to say the tower was pushed in within 5 minutes, the game was over soon after that and I was demoted. Crazy stuff happens to everyone but it doesn't happen every time (as I haven't seen challengers since then). Take it as a learning experience and try again. It's the best anyone can do.
I've been in a situation where I was on 0lp on many divisions and I couldn't risk losing otherwise I'd get demoted. I think if you duo the team MMR drops.

find a duo adc partner or play an ap mage support. Champions like alistair are nice for carrying but they rely alot more on their team to follow up and not be stupid compared to say a full ap annie or lux, where you can blow up a squishy in mere microseconds or stun/snare that 8-0 toplaner that wukong fed and run the hell away.

Nope, it happens to alot of players.

CBF with ranking now due to the changes and patches and what you explain with the following above, It very time consuming.

I manage to find a winning steak by using a VPN to connect to games and disconnecting once in the game. What was really interesting is when I was doing this some of the players would then try and talk to me in French, German and Swedish which was weird. The only thing that got me was the different VPN locations I would use to connect to game.

Coincidence?

Dunno,

But you could try that, using a VPN to connect to different games.

GL

The best way to play league is to not get emotional,because its a game.

Sadly riots top priorities are new champs,skins or any other feature that makes them money and are probably never gonna fix there crappy match making system

It is what it is, just play the game and try and find fun in every game or its just pointless
I would just play with friends i would trust so they dont troll
